title: Brother Cycles 2024 New Colors for Mr. Wooden and Big Bro Available Today
content:
Brother Cycles’ Mr Wooden received a new color, Lilac Metallic, for 2024. The Mr Wooden is an all-rounder, rim brake bike. Gravel, touring, adventure, commuting, the Mr Wooden does it all. This new color is available for ordering today from Brother Cycles…

Specs:

  • Frame tubing: 4130 chromoly double-butted main triangle, ED coated
  • Brake compatibility: cantilever or v-brake
  • Rear Dropouts: 132.5mm quick release (130mm or 135mm hub compatible)
  • Seat post diameter: 27.2mm
  • Headset: 1 1/8″ threadless. EC34/28.6 upper, EC34/30 lower (not included)
  • Front derailleur clamp diameter: 28.6mm
  • Bottom bracket shell: 68mm bottom bracket, ISO threaded
  • Maximum tyre clearance: 650b x 50mm
  • Fork: Lugged flat crown, quick release with mudguard and rack mounts
  • 3 sets bottle cage mounts on all sizes
  • Rear rack and mudguard mounts
  • Chainring clearance: up to 50-39-30t triple, 52-36t double, 48t single
  • Frame weight (medium): 2.0kg
  • Fork weight (uncut steerer): 1.1kg

 

Check out Petor’s review of his Bintage build in our archives:

Where Bintage Hides In The Spectrum Of Fantasy And Reality: A Tael Of Two Brother Cycles Mr Wooden Builds

Also new for 2024, the Big Bro rigid MTB received a Cobalt Blue color. Its ideal locale is rough and rugged terrain from doubletrack to singletrack and the smooth bits of bitumen and hardpack in between. The Big Bro is a long hauler at heart but enjoys quick day rides as well…

Specs:

  • Tubing: – 4130 Chromoly steel – double-butted main triangle, ED coated
  • Brake compatibility; 51mm IS disc brake mount, 180mm max rotor size
  • Dropouts: Boost 12x148mm thru axle (included)
  • Seat post diameter: 30.9mm
  • Seat clamp diameter: 33.1mm (included)
  • Headset: 44mm, SHIS ZS44/28.6 upper, EC44/40 lower (not included)
  • Front derailleur clamp diameter: 34.9 mm high direct-mount (adapter available separately)
  • Bottom bracket shell: 73mm bottom bracket, ISO threaded
  • Maximum tyre clearance: 29″ x 2.6″, 27.5″ x 3.0″ (note: not all drivetrains allow for these maximum tyre clearances)
  • Fork : 4130 Chromoly tapered unicrown fork, ED coated. 15x110mm Boost thru axle (included)
  • Full-length cable housing guides for derailleurs and brakes
  • 3 sets bottle cage mounts on all sizes
  • Chainring clearance: 44-30t double, 38t single
  • Weight: medium (18″) frame 2.60kg, fork (300mm steerer) 1.37kg
  • Tested to ISO 4210 MTB standard

 

The Cobalt Blue Big Bro is available for ordering today from Brother Cycles.
